Package xmlParser

Class SceneDescriptor

java.lang.Object
xmlParser.SceneDescriptor
public class SceneDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
Decodes the necessary values for a scene from the root of an element in an XML file
Author:
Noam Shushan
